import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Payment from "./payment"; import DataItem from "./dataItem"; import DeadlineCounter from "./deadLineCounter"; function Content(props) { useEffect(() => { let thisContent = document.querySelectorAll(".content")[props.id]; if (props.isOpen) { thisContent.style.maxHeight = thisContent.scrollHeight + "px"; thisContent.style.overflow = "visible"; } else { thisContent.style.maxHeight = null; thisContent.style.overflow = "hidden"; } }); return (
} /> } />
} /> } />
} />
); } export default Content;
